programme.title: My Cat from Hell
programme.desc: Jackson Galaxy visits a feline that works with its guardian to help cats with special needs find forever homes. He also learns about cats roles in a prison programme

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Game Wardens patrol the Rio Grande seeking an unidentified body, whilst Warden Powell explores an unusual deer case. And, a nuisance alligator is relocated

programme.title: Dr Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: Dr Jeff visits Mexico to help desperate pets, and some reluctant patients at a monkey sanctuary, while the team catch and treat a pack of street dogs

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Pete Nelson finds the perfect treehouse spot for a couple seeking meditation space. The team creates an energy-infused retreat 20ft up in a twisting pair of maples

programme.desc: Atz Lee and Jane follow the first salmon run of the season, while Otto and Eivin fix the homesteads fences to contain their herd of cows

programme.title: Alaskan Bush People
programme.desc: A family survives in the Alaskan wilderness. As winter approaches, Billy faces a new medical crisis. Elsewhere, a storm forces Noah and Rhain Alisha to make a tough decision

programme.title: Pit Bulls and Parolees

programme.title: Animal Cops Houston
programme.desc: Investigator Dana Almengor tries to find out who is responsible for leaving eight dogs in a kennel - two of which died before the animals were found

programme.title: Winter Walks
programme.desc: Lemn Sissay walks along ancient drovers roads in Cumbrias Dentdale, meeting locals, including a farmer who collects vintage tractors and a lone bagpiper, and making a challenging climb to Englands highest mainline train station

programme.title: Christmas University Challenge
programme.sub-title: University College, Oxford v University of Glasgow
programme.desc: Teams of distinguished graduates from University College, Oxford and the University of Glasgow compete as this festive edition of the academic quiz continues. Jeremy Paxman asks the questions as Paul Gambaccini captains the University College team, while author Christopher Brookmyre leads Glasgow

programme.title: Concorde: A Supersonic Story
programme.desc: As new £19million museum Aerospace Bristol prepares to open, this documentary takes a look at the life of the most glamorous plane ever built. Rare footage tells the forgotten row between the French and British governments over the name of Concorde, which threatened to derail the whole project. Engineers, flight technicians and frequent fliers tell the supersonic story, aided by politician Michael Heseltine and actress Joan Collins, while a former passenger recalls sharing an intimate moment with the Rolling Stones. Narrated by Sophie Okonedo

programme.title: Being the Brontës
programme.desc: Martha Kearney is joined by author Helen Oyeyemi and journalist Lucy Mangan to immerse themselves in the lives of Charlotte, Emily and Anne Brontë to discover the inspiration behind their classic novels Jane Eyre, Wuthering Heights and Agnes Grey. Travelling to the Haworth Parsonage in West Yorkshire, the trio discover how just two years before their most famous novels were published in 1847, the sisters prospects were bleak. Charlotte was in love with a married man, their clergyman father Patrick was going blind, and their brother, Branwell, was battling alcoholism. However, by 1848, Charlotte, Emily and Anne were literary sensations, and Martha, Helen and Lucy immerse themselves in the personal lives of the sisters to find out how this happened

programme.title: Kay Adshead Remembers - Wuthering Heights
programme.desc: Actor, producer and writer Kay Adshead reflects on her portrayal of Cathy Earnshaw in the BBCs 1978 adaptation of Wuthering Heights. She recalls filming on the Yorkshire moors, working alongside Ken Hutchison as Heathcliff, and bringing Emily Brontës storm-swept heroine to life. Kay also talks about the preparation behind the role - the research she undertook, combining the inspiration from earlier portrayals of Cathy with her own individual interpretation

programme.title: Wuthering Heights
programme.desc: Five-part dramatisation of the Emily Bronte classic from 1978. Mr Lockwood , the new tenant of Thrushcross Grange, crosses the moors to visit his landlord Heathcliff. What begins as an innocent social visit becomes a night of terror for Lockwood and a journey into the past for Heathcliff

programme.title: Wuthering Heights
programme.desc: Five-part dramatisation of the Emily Bronte classic from 1978. Heathcliff is determined on revenge for the ill-treatment he receives from Hindley. He is sustained only by his love for Cathy, a love which is returned

programme.title: Wuthering Heights
programme.desc: Three years after his disappearance, a surprise visit from Heathcliff startles the now peacefully-married Cathy. First broadcast 8 October 1978

programme.title: Wuthering Heights
programme.desc: Five-part dramatisation of the Emily Bronte classic. Heathcliffe is consumed by grief after Cathys tragic death. First broadcast 15 October 1978

programme.title: Wuthering Heights
programme.desc: Heathcliff seeks revenge - he imprisons Catherine at Wuthering Heights, refusing to release her until she marries his ailing son Linton. First broadcast 22 October 1978

programme.title: The Read
programme.desc: Bradford born actor Vinette Robinson performs as the narrator for one of Brontes most loved novels - Wuthering Heights. Seen through the eyes of housekeeper Nelly Dean, the story takes shape around the intense and destructive love between Heathcliff and Catherine Earnshaw, set against the backdrop of the Yorkshire moors

programme.title: Pop Go the Sixties
programme.desc: A Whiter Shade of Pale by Procol Harum was one of the 1960s most popular and most-played songs. Its performed here by the group who first recorded it, on Top of the Pops in 1967

programme.title: White Christmas
programme.desc: A pair of former soldiers start a new career as nightclub entertainers. They try to boost the popularity of their old commanding officers struggling winter resort in Vermont by staging a series of extravagant shows, with a little help from their former army buddies and a talented singing sister act. Musical, starring Bing Crosby, Danny Kaye, Vera-Ellen, Dean Jagger, Sig Rumann, Mary Wickes, Anne Whitfield and Rosemary Clooney, featuring seasonal songs by Irving Berlin.

programme.title: Beaches
programme.desc: Brash child performer CC and rich girl Hillary become unlikely friends when they first meet at 11 years old. Years later they are still close, but Hillary, who is now a successful lawyer, is stricken with a terminal illness. CC goes to visit her and together they reflect on the highs and lows of their long, volatile relationship. Drama, starring Bette Midler, Barbara Hershey, John Heard and Mayim Bialik

programme.title: Imagine
programme.sub-title: Bette Midler: The Divine Miss M
programme.desc: Alan Yentob meets Bette Midler in New York, almost five decades after she began her rise from nightclub act to Hollywood star. At the age of 20, the woman who would become known as the Divine Miss M went from working in a pineapple-canning factory in Honolulu, Hawaii, to a role in the 1967 Broadway hit Fiddler on the Roof, and has never looked back. She recalls those early days, as well as the nightclubs and bathhouses of the 1970s, and how she finally made it to the top of the film industry, the combination of a raucous wit and soulful voice making her an outrageous but captivating all-round entertainer

programme.title: The Many Primes of Muriel Spark
programme.desc: Kirsty Wark presents a celebration of the author of The Prime of Miss Jean Brodie, in a programme originally shown in 2018 to mark the centenary of her birth. She revisits Sparks Edinburgh roots, talks to biographer Alan Taylor and conducts the first televised interview with Penelope Jardine, who was a close friend of the writer for 40 years. With contributions from AL Kennedy, Janice Galloway, Ali Smith, William Boyd and Val McDermid

programme.title: Close to Vermeer
programme.desc: Behind the scenes of the largest Vermeer exhibition ever mounted, now on view at the Rijksmuseum in Amsterdam. The documentary follows curators, conservators, collectors and experts in their joint mission to shine a new light on the elusive Dutch Master

programme.title: Concorde: A Supersonic Story
programme.desc: As new £19million museum Aerospace Bristol prepares to open, this documentary takes a look at the life of the most glamorous plane ever built. Rare footage tells the forgotten row between the French and British governments over the name of Concorde, which threatened to derail the whole project. Engineers, flight technicians and frequent fliers tell the supersonic story, aided by politician Michael Heseltine and actress Joan Collins, while a former passenger recalls sharing an intimate moment with the Rolling Stones. Narrated by Sophie Okonedo

programme.title: Breakfast
programme.desc: A round-up of national and international news, plus current affairs, arts and entertainment, and weather

programme.title: Morning Live
programme.desc: Rav Wilding and Helen Skelton host the weekday magazine show featuring a mixture of topical discussion and expert advice for viewers

programme.title: Rip Off Britain
programme.sub-title: Help! Is My Online Job a Scam?
programme.desc: BBC Scam Safe Week continues with the team helping a viewer concerned that the online task work he has been completing might not be genuine. They also have an update on an undercover report into a dodgy spray-foam insulation firm, and how their footage helped put the man responsible behind bars

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: Jacqui Joseph, Martel Maxwell and Tommy Walsh visit a bungalow in Cambridgeshire undergoing a £250,000 renovation, an end terrace in Cumbria bought for £35,000 at auction and a one-bed flat in central London thats due a high-end makeover

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Thomas Forrester and Irita Marriott help two teams buy items to sell in Naseby, Northamptonshire. Christina Trevanion checks out a collection of football programmes

programme.title: BBC News at One; Weather
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: BBC News at One; Weather
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Scam Interceptors
programme.sub-title: The Most Appalling Identity Theft Weve Ever Seen
programme.desc: Ethical hacker Jim Browning wins the team access to a new fraudulent call centre, where criminals are currently stealing one mans passwords and email addresses

programme.title: Make It at Market
programme.desc: Textile waste upcycler Rukhsana wants to turn her hobby into a business but lacks the confidence to promote herself. Her mentor Zoe and Dom Chinea set her the biggest challenge theyve ever given any maker. Electrician Jan wants to swap his day job for a stone-carving career but needs help building the business that will allow him to switch careers

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Steve Brown helps a buyer to return to her childhood home county of Devon, and visits an organic orchard producing award-winning cider

programme.title: The Bidding Room
programme.sub-title: Marble Bust, Diving Boots, Ventriloquist Puppet
programme.desc: The dealers are confronted by a pair of antique diving boots, a ventriloquists puppet who appeared on stage and screen in the 1960s and 1970s and an original 1970s Chopper bicycle

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Natasha Raskin Sharp and Tim Medhurst continues their antiques hunt in Perthshire and Tayside. In Dundee, Natasha uncovers a mysterious Canadian landscape that piques her curiosity, while Tim falls for a humble bit of country pottery. In Pitlochry, the pair get crafty with a quintessential Scottish plant, transforming it into tiny polished treasures

programme.title: Pointless
programme.desc: Quiz show in which four pairs of contestants have to score the fewest points possible by giving the least obvious answers to questions posed to 100 people before the show. At the end of each round, the team with the most points is eliminated until the final two pairs battle for a cash prize. Presented by Alexander Armstrong and Anita Rani

programme.title: BBC News at Six; Weather
programme.desc: The latest headlines

programme.title: The One Show
programme.desc: Lauren Laverne and Vernon Kay host the live magazine show featuring a mixture of celebrity chat and stories of interest

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: Lauren wrestles with a difficult decision, Anthony supports Zoe, and Ian and Elaines feud intensifies

programme.title: Celebrity MasterChef
programme.desc: Todays guest judge is Michelin-trained chef Poppy OToole, who challenges contestants Dawn OPorter, Chris Hughes, Jaki Graham, Jamie Lomas and Michelle Heaton to recreate one of her favourite dishes, each of which contains an element of potato - Poppys favourite ingredient. After that, they are tasked with serving up a two-course dinner party menu to secure their place in the quarter-final

programme.title: Shetland
programme.desc: On a mission to find out the identity of the Callaghans contact in Shetland, Calder piles the pressure on Louden. He reluctantly agrees, but ultimately ends up in grave danger. Stevie is elated to have her sister Amy all to herself, but her mood sours when Calder asks her to come in for further questioning. Sandy tells Tosh that he believes Robert Tulloch was a corrupt police officer. Aware that the revelation will unsettle Billy, Tosh decides to secretly investigate further

programme.title: BBC News at Ten
programme.desc: A round-up of todays headlines

programme.title: Rewarding
programme.desc: One-off comedy about Francis and Sinead, colleagues navigating their first shift together in Mid-Ulsters social care system. They both want the best for their clients - they just have very different ideas on how to do it. Starring Seána Kerslake and Vittorio Angelone

programme.title: Helpless
programme.desc: New wheelchair user Cillian is bored and becomes obsessed with Grace, the curious girl in the flat upstairs. Convinced her boyfriend Joe is mistreating her, he risks everything to be Graces hero - only to uncover dangerous secrets. Standalone comedy, starring George Robinson, Saoirse-Monica Jackson and Éanna Hardwicke

programme.title: Mourning Glory
programme.desc: Lost soul Dermot is newly widowed and as a way of numbing his pain he attends every funeral across Antrim. . But his gate-crashing habit doesnt go unnoticed as the new funeral director catches him in the act - but then makes him an offer he surely cant refuse. One-off comedy, starring Nigel ONeill and Amy Huberman

programme.title: MOTD: UEFA Champions League
programme.desc: Action from the matchday five fixtures, including Arsenal v Bayern Munich at Emirates Stadium, Paris Saint-Germain v Tottenham Hotspur at Parc des Princes and Chelsea v Barcelona at Stamford Bridge. Arsenal and Bayern both went into their match boasting a 100 per cent record so far and PSG and Spurs met in a repeat of the UEFA Super Cup, while the Blues and Barca were looking for wins to move towards the top eight

programme.title: Tell Me Lies
programme.desc: Lucy and Bree attend a professors Christmas party, while Lucy makes a rash decision that affects Pippa

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Breakfast
programme.desc: A round-up of national and international news, plus current affairs, arts and entertainment, and weather

programme.title: Morning Live
programme.desc: Matt Allwright and Gaby Roslin host the weekday magazine show featuring a mixture of topical discussion and expert advice for viewers

programme.title: Rip Off Britain
programme.sub-title: I Was Part of the Worlds Largest Scam
programme.desc: Gloria Hunniford, Louise Minchin and Julia Somerville unite the victim of an international investment scam network with one of the investigative journalists who uncovered it. At least 32,000 people lost more than £200 million in the crime. Plus, how purchasing gift cards on someone elses behalf can leave someone vulnerable to being scammed, and the Liverpool fan who was left empty-handed when he tried to buy tickets from an unofficial seller

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: Dion Dublin and Jacqui Joseph track the progress on renovations on a Suffolk bungalow, a former chapel in Staffordshire and a 1930s semi-detached house in Bexleyheath, south-east London

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Caroline Hawley hosts from Shrewsbury in Shropshire, where experts Thomas Forrester and Mark Stacey guide the red and blue teams as they go in search of some bargains before selling them at auction in Lichfield. Caroline also visits RAF Cosford to learn about a team of Spitfire-flying women

programme.title: BBC News at One; Weather
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: BBC News at One; Weather
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Scam Interceptors
programme.desc: The team closes in on scammers posing as the UKs National Crime Agency. Confronting them with their crimes spooks the fraudsters, but it is going to take more than one hit to put this bunch of cybercriminals out of action. Presented by Rav Wilding and Nick Stapleton

programme.title: Make It at Market
programme.desc: Ex-musician Matt is hoping to turn his furniture-making hobby into a business, but has a confidence problem that mentor Bruce Kenneth needs to find a way to get him past. Mentor Piyush Suri wants to help textile designer Jess make money from her hobby but first she needs to broaden her product range

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Sonali Shah visits Scotland, making her way to Dumfries and Galloway with a married couple from London who are seeking a life-changing move. Theyre hoping their £350,000 budget can buy a house for them with enough land for a retreat business. Sonali also visits an ethical dairy farm that has written a brand new rule book when it comes to animal welfare

programme.title: The Bidding Room
programme.sub-title: Egg Chair, Roller Skates, Boxing Belt
programme.desc: Nigel Havers presides as five sellers aim to get the best price for their items including the Peter Ghyczy Egg Chair, a pair of roller-skates, an Art Deco dining room suite, a mid-century braille micrometer and a replica boxing belt

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Natasha Raskin Sharp and Tim Medhursts road trip rolls into Edinburgh, packed with laughs, surprises and oddball finds. Tim falls for a whimsical pair of faux-bois fairy chairs, while Tash is drawn to a mythical beast in the form of brass fire dogs. However, its a deceptively delicate piece of porcelain that might just steal the show. Away from the shops, the duo discover a local company dedicated to keeping the traditional art of tapestry alive

programme.title: Pointless
programme.desc: Quiz show in which four pairs of contestants have to score the fewest points possible by giving the least obvious answers to questions posed to 100 people before the show. At the end of each round, the team with the most points is eliminated until the final two pairs battle for a cash prize. Presented by Alexander Armstrong and Anita Rani

programme.title: BBC News at Six; Weather
programme.desc: The latest headlines

programme.title: The One Show
programme.desc: Roman Kemp and Alex Jones host the live magazine show featuring a mixture of celebrity chat and stories of interest

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: Anthony looks to the future, Kims slip-up has consequences for Elaine, and the truth dawns on a horrified local

programme.title: Celebrity Race Across the World
programme.desc: The teams travel through the breathtaking beauty of Costa Rica, a country that contains five per cent of the worlds biodiversity, before reaching Panama, the seventh country of the race. The next checkpoint is Bocas del Toro, an archipelago off Panamas Caribbean coast

programme.title: Celebrity MasterChef
programme.desc: For the second quarter-final, the celebrities take on the pairs challenge. Each duo has their own recipe and must deliver two identical portions of that dish, but will be working on separate benches, and only one of them will have access to the recipe. The recipes in this round are both desserts, a bakewell tart and a millefeuille. Judges Grace Dent and John Torode have one more challenge up their culinary sleeves. The contenders need to prepare their most splendid two-course menu for three special diners - Celebrity MasterChef 2024 champion Vito Coppola and former finalists Rochenda Sandall and Harry Aikines-Aryeetey

programme.title: BBC News at Ten
programme.desc: A round-up of todays headlines

programme.title: The View
programme.desc: Mark Carruthers reviews the weeks political news, including reports on the latest events at Stormont and Westminster. Plus, comment and analysis with studio guests

programme.title: Question Time
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce presents the topical debate, inviting a panel of politicians and other guests in Watford, Hertfordshire, to answer questions from an invited audience on subjects that have made the headlines over the past week

programme.title: Newscast
programme.desc: A panel of BBC journalists hosts a weekly round-up from Westminster, delivering the usual mix of serious analysis and light-hearted gossip about the biggest stories in politics

programme.title: Tell Me Lies
programme.sub-title: Dont Struggle Like That, or I Will Only Love You More
programme.desc: Its the end of term and Christmas celebrations change everything for everyone - yet again

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: From warring brothers to farting mothers, Horrible Histories presents some of the biggest, best and worst rivalries throughout time. Guest starring Rosie Jones, Fred Sirieix and Rob Rinder

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: From how Henry VIII had the most comfortable poo possible, to finding out which bit of his house Charles Dickens called the Demon - take a tour of horrible homes through history.

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May set out to discover if they can go motor racing for less than it costs to play golf. Theres also a double helping of guests, with rock star Slash and former Formula One driver Kimi Raikkonen taking to the track in Reasonably Priced Cars. Richard also gets behind the wheel of the BMW M5, which is powered by a twin-turbo V8 engine instead of the high-revving V10 of its predecessor

programme.title: The Idea of You
programme.desc: Forty-year-old gallery owner and single mother Solène takes her daughter to a music festival, where she crosses paths with 24-year-old singer Hayes - the lead singer of a world-famous boy band - and the two begin a whirlwind romance. But the couple soon find themselves at the centre of a social media storm when fans of the band discover Hayes is dating an older woman. Romance, starring Anne Hathaway and Nicholas Galitzine. Based on the novel by Robinne Lee

programme.title: PS I Love You
programme.desc: Widowed Holly feels she cannot cope following the death of her husband. However, on her birthday, she receives a letter he wrote to her just before he died, encouraging her to live life to the full rather than languish in sorrow. This is just the first in a series of messages, each one sending her on wild misadventures and helping her to move on. Romantic drama based on Cecelia Aherns novel, starring Hilary Swank, Gerard Butler and Lisa Kudrow

programme.title: Daddy Issues
programme.desc: Sitcom about a father and daughter reunited when the latter falls pregnant. Exhausted Gemma, living with her three-month-old daughter, sees her formerly estranged mother Davina move in. Instead of helping, her mum lives an irritatingly carefree life. Meanwhile, father Malcolm is living back at the bedsit, sleeping on an inflatable bed on the landing. Missing her dad and in a state of despair, Gemma conspires with Malcolm and Derek to hatch a plot to oust Davina. Starring Aimee Lou Wood, David Morrissey, Jill Halfpenny and Sarah Hadland

programme.title: RuPauls Drag Race UK
programme.desc: The search for the UKs Next Drag Race Superstar is nearly over, and Mama Ru is testing the queens comedy chops with a challenge that has seen many a well-seasoned queen fall at the last hurdle, the comedy roast - and this one comes with an added new-age twist. Comedian, writer and actor Sophie Willan is on hand to help coach the queens and joins Ru, Michelle Visage, and Alan Carr on the judging panel as the contestants vie for a much coveted place in the final

programme.title: Confessions of a Teenage Fraudster
programme.desc: How a 16-year-old used his job in a call centre in Glasgow to go on a five-year crime wave, defrauding innocent cardholders and laying the groundwork for a life of wealth, first-class travel and an escape from the life he was destined for

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May set out to discover if they can go motor racing for less than it costs to play golf. Theres also a double helping of guests, with rock star Slash and former Formula One driver Kimi Raikkonen taking to the track in Reasonably Priced Cars. Richard also gets behind the wheel of the BMW M5, which is powered by a twin-turbo V8 engine instead of the high-revving V10 of its predecessor

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Gruesome events and characters from the past. This episode ventures on holiday with Queen Vic, enjoys a view of Napoleon the tourist attraction and has some deadly treats to eat

programme.title: The Hit List
programme.desc: Marvin and Rochelle Humes present as Strictly Come Dancing stars Gemma Atkinson, Gorka Marquez, Aljaz Skorjanec, Janette Manrara, Clara Amfo and Johannes Radebe take part in the music-based quiz show, with a £10,000 charity jackpot up for grabs. Across three rounds, their knowledge is put to the test, as they attempt to identify huge hits from across the years. Whether its a song from the swinging 60s or the number-one track in todays charts, the teams must prove their ability to recognise songs from all genres of music - from pop to country, rock to RandB and many more

programme.title: Alan Carrs Picture Slam
programme.desc: Alan Carr hosts the game show in which three teams of contestants have to identify a board full of images, with a chance of winning up to £10,000 if they know them all. Playing this week are a mother and daughter from Kings Lynn, and two couples from Great Yarmouth and Glasgow

programme.title: RuPauls Drag Race UK
programme.desc: Choreographer Claudimar Neto coaches the queens as they write and perform a show-stopping original song. As ever, its a family line-up for the finale, with Michelle Visage, Alan Carr and Graham Norton forming the judging panel, and last years winner and reigning champion, Kyran Thrax, dropping in along with the seasons eliminated queens

programme.title: Survivor Australia
programme.desc: Twelve pairs of loved ones take on the challenge of the Aussie format of the hit game show in the wilderness of Charters Towers in Queensland. Returning contestant Andy takes charge of the Water Tribe, but is it really a good idea to be front and centre?

programme.title: Survivor Australia
programme.desc: More action from the Down Under take on Survivor. Trust and Unity are important in the game of Survivor. Will Shay vote with her trusted alliance member Briana or jump ship to support the unity of the tribe and vote out Chrissy?

programme.title: Scam Land: Money, Mayhem and Maseratis
programme.desc: Journalist Mobeen Azhar investigates the story of Gurvin Singh, a medical student who one evening near Christmas, decided to hand out free cash to unsuspecting strangers in Plymouth city centre. He told the local paper that he was giving back to the community having made thousands of pounds through forex trading. Weeks later rumours were rife that Gurvins trading claims were a scam. With meme pages and social media profiles providing the clues, Mobeen discovers that Gurvin is at the centre of an alleged scam involving millions of pounds

programme.title: Scam Land: Money, Mayhem and Maseratis
programme.desc: Mobeen Azhar investigates the world of online forex trading, discovering a world where remarkably similar claims of success suggest that the story of Gurvin could be one of many. Having tried to make contact with Mr Gurvz, as hes known online, Mobeen is blocked from his social media accounts. A tip-off leads him to a south London community group who were also involved in a forex investment that didnt go to plan. The conversation provides a revelation that potentially links both cases to an established brand with offices right in the heart of Londons financial district

programme.title: Confessions of a Teenage Fraudster
programme.desc: Between the ages of 17 and 21, Elliot Castro managed to commit fraudulent activity amounting to a estimated £2 million. This documentary continues his story. With a trail of crime stretching across several continents as he continued to live life on the run, then 18-year-old Elliot became more paranoid than ever and a stint in foreign jail seemed just around the corner

programme.desc: In Middlesbrough, steak and seafood restaurant, Lost Property, kick start the competition with head chef Joe and manager Maria whipping up some serious surf-and-turf sharing boards but one fellow foodie doesnt hold back on their criticism of the cuisine. Day two sees best friends Tom and Jack go all out with their small-plates spot, Finkle and Green, as they throw together a vast array of their favourite dishes to give the group a taste of what theyre all about. Finally, laid-back Jenny and Jack at Banh Mi show off their pan-Asian plates in their trendy underground restaurant. Their guests are captivated by their authentic food, but can Jack and Jenny hold on to their relaxed reputation and win over the table?

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Lee Juggurnauth jets off to Spain to help childhood sweethearts Sue and Albert from Chatham, Kent, find their perfect holiday home. The pair first discovered Benalmadena on the Costa del Sol five years ago and instantly fell in love with it, so much so that theyve been back 10 times and now intend to buy a holiday home where they can spend time with their family. Lee lines up five great options for their budget of £190,000. Will Sue and Albert love any of them enough to make an offer?

programme.title: Help! We Bought a Village
programme.desc: Ivano and Tracey deal with more damage to the ancient fragile structures in their trulli village and Louise and Paul uncover more of their 300 year-old Hamlets past. Liz and Dave fight to keep their resurrected ghost holiday village alive

programme.title: The Great BandB Challenge

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Therapists Bernie and Vernon, who first met 15 years ago, are searching for their perfect holiday home on the Canary Island of Fuerteventura. They love travelling, and although Vernons never actually been to Fuerteventura before, theyre convinced its the perfect place for their holiday home. Sara Damergi shows them the best of what their £150,000 budget can buy; will any of her options hit the mark?

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Analysis of todays Budget, announced this afternoon by Chancellor Rachel Reeves. Including sport and weather

programme.title: The Political Slot
programme.desc: Luke Charters, MP for Outer York, discusses Labours plan to reduce antisocial behaviour and to make Britains high streets safer

programme.title: Grand Designs: House of the Year
programme.desc: On the Kent coast, a contemporary home makes the beach itself part of everyday life, blending work with an endless sense of escape. In east London, a landlocked plot is transformed into a sun-filled sanctuary, precisely angled to catch every ray while shutting out the city around it. In suburban Surrey, a burst of tropical colour, terracotta and greenery conjures the Caribbean. In London, a calm retreat draws on Japanese traditions, with timber frames and courtyards that blur the line between house and garden. In Wiltshire, soaring rooflines stretch outwards to frame vast views of cathedral spires and meadows. California comes to south London in the form of a dazzling American-style glass and steel home. Each house offers an experience like no other. But only the best will earn a place on the shortlist

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: A 65-year-old woman is rushed to Queens Medical Centre in Nottingham after being found collapsed in the park. Domestic cleaner Deanna, a long-serving member of the AandE team, shares her struggles in early life, including overcoming addiction, before finding her purpose working in the hospital. The doctors treat a teenager with a burn on her hand

programme.title: Emergency Helicopter Medics
programme.desc: The Essex crew and Herts Air Ambulance race to help a teenager, who has a major brain injury after colliding with a car in Hemel Hempstead. In Bicester, Dimis heart is racing dangerously fast and needs to be shocked back into a normal rhythm and in Clacton, some DIY goes wrong for Martin, who has a suspected broken collarbone

programme.title: Britains Most Expensive Houses
programme.desc: In the Vale of Glamorgan, agents Sorcha Rodbard-Hedderwick and Jemma Friday are marketing £2.2 million Llwynhelig House - a Grade II-listed manor featuring a log cabin and shepherds hut. Broker Margaret Thompson is in Jersey to showcase £17 million Sunningdale Manor, which has undergone a multimillion-pound renovation. In London, agent Constance Cunningham presents three high-end apartments to Argentinian lawyer Ramiro, and in Cornwall, Ian Lillicrap returns to the charming village of Flushing, where hes been called to value a 16th-century house that hes sold twice before

programme.title: Outrageous Homes
programme.desc: Laurence Llewelyn-Bowen meets Trevor, whos 86 and has dedicated decades to creating his very own Venetian palazzo in Staines, from plunging light wells to vaulted ceilings and lavish waterways. On the Isle of Wight, Laurence takes a trip to Poppys kawaii home of ice-cream lights, doughnut sprinkles and cotton candy walls. The interior design expert also meets Sonia, whos been both thrifty and nifty in her maximalist mini mansion

programme.title: Summerwater

Meanwhile, on the tranquil loch, Alex relives his troubles back home, and the guilt of having hurt someone who he cares about puts him in harms way

programme.desc: Neurosurgeon and scientist Richard Mair races to treat patients with deadly brain cancers as part of a world-first clinical trial intended to give patients more time. He analyses patients tumour DNA and rapidly matches them with targeted drugs. It could be the biggest leap forward in brain cancer for 30 years. Taking part in the trial is family man David, whos having brain surgery and tests to discover if he has an aggressive cancer. programme.desc: In Hull, a vulnerable man is violently attacked in his home and left for dead after his assailant sets fire to his flat. But who is he and what drove him to commit such a crime?

Robin discovers James has cheated on his husband Tom and is getting a divorce, and begins to worry how Barney will react to the news. Meanwhile, Ted fears being the only single man at the marriage ceremony and staying alone at a romantic hotel. American sitcom, starring Josh Radnor and Alyson Hannigan

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Amys honeymoon runs aground in New York, Penny and Leonard discover that they are uncomfortably similar to Amys parents, while Raj insults astrophysicist Neil deGrasse Tyson and starts a war on social media. Kathy Bates and Teller (of Penn and Teller fame) guest star as Amys parents

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Amy drive themselves to distraction trying to figure out what the perfect gift is that Leonard and Penny have got them for their wedding. Meanwhile, Raj decides he wants to settle down and asks his father to arrange a marriage for him

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In Northampton, fitness instructor Pam and her boyfriend Glenn kick off the competition with a Spanish fiesta. The food gets a good grilling from guests Victoria and boyfriend Delroy and Wendy and her husband Mark. Day two sees Victoria and Delroy opting for a Caribbean menu. Finally its the turn of Wendy and Mark to host, though things dont go quite according to plan

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: The first hosts in Essex, complaints investigator Callum and his wife Alison, have put together a fun-filled menu, despite Callums not-so-cheery nature. Mike and Carol host next, and their guests are shocked when Carol shares an unexpected story about a fiery feud, then theres an outburst over the Essex dialect during dessert. Finally, Tony and Coni have a rustic, hearty theme, and serve three large pies for the main

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay visits Sushi Ko, a Japanese restaurant in California that is losing up to $20,000 a month. Gordon finds owner and chef Akira lacking in confidence and self-esteem as the strain of an empty business is beginning to take its toll on his relationship with this family

programme.title: Dont Tell the Bride
programme.desc: Self-professed nerd Owen Walsh plans his big day, but while fiancee Lisa Toner dreams of an elegant lakeside wedding, he is thinking of a ceremony on the side of a mountain with his bride arriving on horseback, sporting a cape - just like the ladies in his favourite fantasy show Game of Thrones. However, as his budget grows tighter, his vision of a medieval spectacle looks less likely - will his ideal wedding end up being more a game of moans?

programme.title: Dont Tell the Bride
programme.desc: Jennifer has always dreamed of a large traditional wedding in their local church in Callan, but husband-to-be Robbie has decided on a Christmas-themed ceremony. The return of the programme in which a groom takes control of the organisation of his wedding

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Shawnon Bellah, the chief operating officer of Nestle Toll House Cafe by Chip, goes undercover in her own company. Ever since Shawnon came on board, the firm has been expanding its franchise locations at a rapid pace. She wants to ensure that as they grow, they arent losing the quality and consistency that has made their brand so profitable

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay visits Sushi Ko, a Japanese restaurant in California that is losing up to $20,000 a month. Gordon finds owner and chef Akira lacking in confidence and self-esteem as the strain of an empty business is beginning to take its toll on his relationship with this family

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay visits California, where his job is to help the owner of Lido Di Manhattan. Lisa Marie Hemmat, an ambitious business school graduate, has been running the restaurant for the past five years, but has failed to exert any control over the kitchen and the menu. The chef tries to teach her the basics of cooking and venue management, but trouble brews when her staff threaten to walk out on relaunch night

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay visits Mojito, a Cuban cafe in Brooklyn, New York. The restaurant was the shared dream of two newlyweds who have separated since its opening, and whose constant public quarrelling is distracting staff and driving customers away

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny tries to put a stop to Leonards plan to be a sperm donor for her ex-boyfriend Zacks wife. Howard, Bernadette, Anu and Raj make the most of the latters cancelled stag party

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: When the friends find out that Wil Wheaton is hosting a celebrity game of Dungeons and Dragons at his home, deception and betrayal become the order of the day as they compete to occupy the one open seat at the event. With guest appearance by William Shatner, Kareem Abdul-Jabbar and Kevin Smith

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny and Bernadette go to San Diego for a pharmaceutical sales convention, leaving Howard in charge of the children. When Sheldon finds a book containing science experiments to carry out with children, the guys and Amy make a day of it, using little Michael and Halley as test subjects

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Amys academic rivals embark on a publicity tour, so the couple try to get the Nobel laureates on their side. Halleys fear of the dark leads to opportunity and conflict for Howard, Bernadette and Stuart

programme.desc: Jon Richardson and Joe Wilkinson take on Lee Mack and Katherine Ryan in the comedy words-and-numbers game, while the Brett Domino Trio join Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner. Hosted by Jimmy Carr, with Rachel Riley looking after the numbers and letters

programme.desc: First-ever episode of the comedy game show with Greg Davies setting Roisin Conaty, Tim Key, Romesh Ranganathan, Frank Skinner and Josh Widdicombe challenges including trying to paint the best picture of a horse while riding a horse, melon-eating and bath-emptying. programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Adam is excited about introducing Carmen to his family, but is shocked by a past incident between her and one of his siblings. Geoff helps Pop-Pop to improve his room-mate status

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Lily frets when she sees a list of the things Ted wants to do in New York before he moves to Chicago. Robin and Barney realise the short amount of time they have left together before their relatives begin to arrive ahead of their wedding. Meanwhile, Lily plans her revenge after she discovers Ted and Marshall accidentally destroyed her favourite dress. American sitcom, starring Josh Radnor and Alyson Hannigan

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Barney is upset when he discovers Ted still has feelings for Robin, and works through his anger at a poker night. Marshall hasnt made it back to New York yet, but manages to help settle their dispute via a video call. Meanwhile, Lily realises she is Robins only female friend and begins to worry she could be lonely while shes in Rome for a year, so sets about attempting to find her a replacement buddy. American sitcom, starring Josh Radnor and Alyson Hannigan

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Howard and Bernadettes life becomes complicated when Stuart starts bringing his new girlfriend home. Penny and Leonard talk about starting a family, and Raj further explores the possibility of an arranged marriage

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: When Sheldon refuses to tell anyone why hes never mentioned Tam, apparently his childhood best friend, Leonard tries to find out more. Penny and Bernadette invite Rajs fiancee Anu out for dinner so they can find out more about her

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In Essex, partners Mike and Heather hope to impress their guests with a menu of Mediterranean-inspired dishes, but Fussy eaters Jess and Salv cant hide their true feelings about the starter

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Three couples compete to throw the best dinner party in the West Midlands. Image-conscious couple Sarah and Jack kick off the competition with a clean-living menu. Their guests think the food is a little too healthy, but the entertainment breaks the ice as everyone lets loose at the silent disco. On day two, foodies Liz and Martin cook an Italian feast from scratch, inspired by recipes from Lizs Italian mother. Finally Carl and Sonya serve up a pub-inspired menu and a huge surprise

programme.title: Dont Tell the Bride
programme.desc: Harry Potter fan Brendan attempts to conjure up a magical wedding day for his partner Victor, who unfortunately has not even seen the movies

programme.desc: Tim Betts, the CEO of Muscle Maker Grill, goes undercover in the company he recently bought. Tim wants to make sure the brand is healthy and continues to expand, and he believes its key that as they grow, each restaurant branch follows the same set of corporate standards. Tim thinks its the perfect time to learn whats working and what needs an overhaul, so he meets staff including franchisees, a delivery driver, a food truck manager and a cashier whose flirtatious manner shocks him

programme.desc: Sienna, Dodger and the McQueens step in to help new mum Cleo as she finally gets the support she needs. The Osbornes get to know Frankies new beau. And new resident Gemma tries to build bridges with Mercedes

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube

Gordon Ramsay heads to Easton, Pennsylvania, to help the troubled pair and save the business from financial disaster

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay revisits three restaurants he helped that were among the biggest challenges he faced, finding out whether they stayed on the road to recovery or turned back into nightmares. First he meets sisters Rita and Lisa to see if they have continued serving fresh instead of frozen food at Bostons La Galleria 33, before heading to the Olde Hitching Post in Hanson, Massachusetts, to discover whether controlling owner Tom has kept his promise and handed over the reins to his daughter Andrea. Finally, Gordon goes back to the Prohibition gastro pub in Everett, Washington, to catch up with owner Rishi and learn if she has ditched belly-dancing in favour of running her business

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Marge encourages Bart to explore his creative side and signs him up for piano lessons, but the youngster is less than enthusiastic about the prospect until he meets his Russian teacher Zhenya. Meanwhile, Homer is distraught after losing his last two hairs and becoming completely bald. Guest starring the voices of Jane Krakowski, Bill Hader and Justin Bieber

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer, Moe and Lenny go in pursuit of Carl when he skips town with $200,000 in winnings from a lottery ticket he bought with them. However, their search makes them realise how little they know about their friend and almost reaches a dead-end until Lisa points them in the direction of Iceland. Featuring music by Sigur Ros

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon discovers a surprise screening of The Avengers is scheduled at a local cinema, complete with a QandA session with the films director, Joss Whedon. However, the event just happens to clash with time hed planned to spend with Amy, so he decides to pay Stuart to be his subtitute for the afternoon while he and the other boys immerse themselves in Marvel superheroics. Meanwhile, Leonards mother Beverly arrives in town for an extended visit, and Penny takes the opportunity to bond with her new mother-in-law - and to make up for not inviting her to the wedding. Comedy, guest starring Christine Baranski

programme.title: Modern Family

Comedy, starring Ed ONeill and Julie Bowen

programme.desc: Marge and Homers marriage is tested as they swap Springfield for a tropical island in a bid to win a million dollars on Marges favourite TV show

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The friends struggle through an awkward morning after Sheldons mother and Leonards father share an evening together. Pennys family arrives in town to attend Penny and Leonards second wedding ceremony. Keith Carradine, Laurie Metcalf, Christine Baranski and Judd Hirsch guest star

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Howard has a meeting with Colonel Williams, a representative from the US air forces department of material command, about the gyroscope he invented with Leonard and Sheldon. Penny accidentally reveals that Bernadette is pregnant to their colleagues at work. Dean Norris guest stars

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Phil comes across footage of an incriminating sneeze while looking at Cameron and Mitchells wedding video that proves he is responsible for the familys flu epidemic, so he sets about getting rid of the proof with the help of Luke and some creative editing. Claire struggles to make it through an important business meeting while feeling under the weather, while Cam is forced to make a difficult decision when it comes to Manny and the school football team. Mitch meets Lilys know-it-all friend and male nanny Andy (Andy DeVine) makes a welcome return

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: The Dunphys move into a hotel while their house is being treated for mould, but when they are forced to share a single room, cabin fever soon sets in. Gloria worries after finding out that Manny is dating one of the popular girls at school, while Cams attempt to keep his football teams unprecedented winning streak going is threatened by a cursed Mitchell

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is given the chance to square off against the one actor from the Star Trek franchise he holds a grudge against - Wil Wheaton. Meanwhile, Leonard asks Penny to set Howard up on a date with one of her friends. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki and Jim Parsons

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard worries his lack of American football knowledge is alienating him from Penny and her friends. However, he finds an unlikely sporting tutor in the form of Sheldon, who reluctantly spent most of his childhood attending games with his father. Meanwhile, Raj is infuriated when Howard abandons him to pursue a girl at a kite-fighting contest

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: A jealous Leonard argues with Penny when she invites one of her male friends to stay at her apartment while he is in town. Unfortunately, the row brings up unpleasant memories for Sheldon of watching his warring parents, causing even more tension between the friends. Johnny Galecki, Kaley Cuoco and Jim Parsons star

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard, Raj and Howard go camping to watch the Leonid meteor shower, but the trip takes an unexpected turn thanks to some specially baked cookies. Meanwhile, Penny injures herself in the shower, and with the rest of the gang out of town, its left to Sheldon to come to her aid

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: When Sheldon is bullied by an unlikely character, Mary and George disagree on how to handle the situation, contemplating whether they should their son employ self-defence techniques. Undeterred, he tries his hand at jiu-jitsu and even covers himself in bubble-wrap for protection

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.sub-title: A Mother, a Child and a Blue Mans Backside
programme.desc: When Mary bans Sheldon from reading a comic book that she considers to be too mature for him, the youngster decides its time to stop living under his mothers thumb

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: The Clown Stays in the Picture
programme.desc: Krusty reveals the story of his past in a movie, while Bart and Lisa work as his personal assistants on the film and learn about the early years of their parents relationship

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer takes the kids joyriding in Comic Book Guys car and ends up being taken to court. With the voice of Guillermo Del Toro.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon tries to extend his lifespan, concerned he will not be around long enough for his consciousness to be downloaded into a robot body, and the friends encounter Apple co-founder Steve Wozniak (guest starring as himself) at the Cheesecake Factory

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon breaks up with Amy and turns to cats in his search for an alternative to human companionship. However, when he starts to bulk-buy pets, Leonard decides enough is enough and calls for reinforcements to help bring his friend back to his senses. Comedy, starring Jim Parsons

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: An embarrassing secret from Howards past comes to light as he tries to win back Bernadette, while Sheldon and Raj engage in a battle of wills when they have to work in the same office. Guest starring Katee Sackhoff and George Takei

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard is depressed that everyone seems to be paired off except him, and resorts to desperate measures to get a girlfriend. Meanwhile, Sheldon looks for a way out of his relationship with Amy, who wants him to meet her mother. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki and Jim Parsons

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: $pringfield (Or How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love Legalised Gambling)
programme.desc: Mr Burns decides to open a casino in Springfield, and it is not before long Marge is bitten by the gambling bug - much to the dismay of her family. Animated comedy, with the guest voices of Gerry Cooney and Robert Goulet

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: A mysterious cat burglar ransacks the Simpson household, making off with Lisas saxophone. Homer becomes the leader of a neighbourhood watch scheme to find the miscreant - but soon lets the power go to his head. Featuring the guest voice of Sam Neill

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The family hears about Grampas time in the Air Force, and when Milhouses Dutch cousin Annika pops by, Bart takes up smoking to impress her. Featuring the guest voice of Game of Thrones Carice van Houten

programme.title: Animal Control
programme.desc: Franks investigation reaches a thrilling conclusion. Emily finds herself in an awkward position when she realises that she still has feelings for Shred

programme.title: Americas Next Top Model
programme.desc: The girls head to Universal Studios for a photoshoot, and are challenged to pose for a breast-cancer awareness campaign. Eric Daman joins the panel as a guest judge, and Brittani is accused of unprofessionalism when her temper flares during an altercation with Alexandria

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The regular gaggle of family and friends share their thoughts on shows including Im a Celebrity, Get Me Out of Here!, The Great British Bake Off, The Crown, Family Fortunes, Mammals, Love Is Blind and This Morning

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Business development manager Emily is looking for a tall, dark, handsome man with good manners, but when part-time model Matt starts talking about alien abduction their conversation is at risk of drying up. Martial arts instructor Ian meets Liverpudlian Lindsay, whos ready to date again after a difficult few years, and he certainly seems to live up to her expectations, while receptionist Natasha, who has been out of the dating game for a couple of years, sits down with chef Oskar, whose laidback manner quickly puts her at ease

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Two more singletons choose a date from a selection of six naked people, who will be revealed to them one body part at a time. After nine months of being single, 23-year-old university graduate Sapphire from Kent has decided to see if she can find her ideal woman by stripping back the layers. Thirty-two-year-old account manager Kieron from Basingstoke has spent the past three years single to focus on his career, but now hes ready to put finding a partner at the top of his to do list. Anna Richardson hosts

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Raj is upset after Lucy runs away in the middle of their date, leaving the gang to cheer him up. However, when Howard bumps into her, she admits she is incredibly shy. Meanwhile, Sheldon asks Penny to help with a new episode of Fun with Flags, and because he is impressed by her acting ability, the friends go to see her in a performance of A Streetcar Named Desire

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: While the girls go to Disneyland and get made up as princesses, the guys have to promote science as a career option for women at Howards old middle school. Meanwhile, Raj and Lucy have their first date in a library, where instead of speaking to each other they send text messages

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The regular gaggle of family and friends share their thoughts on shows including Im a Celebrity, Get Me Out of Here!, The Great British Bake Off, The Crown, Family Fortunes, Mammals, Love Is Blind and This Morning

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer and Marge buy a self-help video to improve their lives - but make the mistake of enlisting Bart and Lisas assistance. Featuring the voices of James Brown and Albert Brooks

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: When Sheldon is bullied by an unlikely character, Mary and George disagree on how to handle the situation, contemplating whether they should their son employ self-defence techniques. Undeterred, he tries his hand at jiu-jitsu and even covers himself in bubble-wrap for protection

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.sub-title: A Mother, a Child and a Blue Mans Backside
programme.desc: When Mary bans Sheldon from reading a comic book that she considers to be too mature for him, the youngster decides its time to stop living under his mothers thumb

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Phil and Claire decide to take a cycling tour through Italy before they become grandparents, while Dylan introduces them to his mother, who has an interesting past. Meanwhile, Cameron and Mitchell discover some interesting reading material in Lilys room and decide to confront her about it, and Gloria and Jay find out their respective great uncles may have fought on opposing sides of a war

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.sub-title: Call Me When You Get There
programme.desc: Barry is thrilled by the freedom his new driving licence brings, until Beverly insists he sticks to her 10 rules of the road at all times. Meanwhile, Pops refuses to wear an emergency alert bracelet and is forced to call Adam when he suffers a fall. Comedy, starring Wendi McLendon-Covey and Jeff Garlin

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Beverly is determined to make friends with her reserved and softly spoken neighbours, the Kremps, so she bombards them with invitations to a barbecue. Meanwhile, Barry and Erica battle for control of the familys telephone line and beg their parents to get a second one installed. Comedy, starring Wendi McLendon-Covey and Jeff Garlin

programme.title: Picnic
programme.desc: A drifter turns up in a small American town looking for a well-off old friend in the hope of borrowing money. However, he causes nothing but trouble for the locals, seducing both his old pals fiancee and a local schoolteacher. Drama based on William Inges Pulitzer Prize-winning play, starring William Holden, Cliff Robertson and Kim Novak

programme.title: Hangmans Knot
programme.desc: Confederate soldiers wipe out a group of Union troops carrying a shipment of gold, but later learn the Civil War ended the month before, rendering their attack a criminal act. The soldiers go on the run with the loot, but their worries deepen when they are besieged by bandits. Western, starring Randolph Scott, Donna Reed, Lee Marvin and Richard Denning.

programme.title: Arizona Raiders
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the American Civil War, two Confederate soldiers are offered a way out of jail. Their former comrades-in-arms are now a gang of bandits terrorising Arizona, and the two prisoners are sent to infiltrate the group and bring them to justice. Western, starring Audie Murphy, Buster Crabbe, Ben Cooper and Gloria Talbott

programme.title: The Blue Lamp
programme.desc: A veteran policeman gives a new recruit the benefit of his experience, while two crooks plan a series of robberies. When the two duos meet, the older constable is shot and killed, and his protege sets out to bring the killers to justice. Police drama, starring Jack Warner in a role he would reprise for TV series Dixon of Dock Green. With Jimmy Hanley and Dirk Bogarde

programme.title: Hunter Killer
programme.desc: Unconventional submarine skipper Joe Glass is sent to investigate the torpedoing of US and Russian vessels. He winds up trying to rescue the Russian president, who has been kidnapped by a rogue general. Action thriller, starring Gerard Butler, Gary Oldman and Common

programme.title: Transporter 2
programme.desc: A retired former special forces agent has the job of chauffeuring the son of a controversial Miami politician. When Russian criminals kidnap the youngster and inject him with a virus in the hope of infecting his father, the driver sets out to find the boy and his abductors. Action thriller sequel, starring Jason Statham, Alessandro Gassman and Amber Valletta

programme.title: xXx
programme.desc: Extreme sports star Xander Cage finds himself in trouble when his daredevil exploits land him behind bars. However, he is offered an intriguing escape route, courtesy of National Security Agent Augustus Gibbons - who thinks the adrenaline junkie is the perfect man to bring down a gang of international terrorists in Prague. Action adventure, starring Vin Diesel, Samuel L Jackson, Asia Argento, Marton Csokas and Michael Roof.

programme.title: xXx: The Next Level
programme.desc: The American secretary of defence forms a covert military organisation with the intention of assassinating the president. A government spymaster is ready to foil the plot but, since his top agent is dead, he has to recruit an imprisoned soldier to help him. Action sequel, starring Ice Cube, Samuel L Jackson and Willem Dafoe

programme.title: The Last Hurrah
programme.desc: A headstrong New England mayor launches one final re-election campaign. However, he finds the nature of politics is changing and he has a powerful enemy in a wealthy and influential local banker. John Fords drama, starring Spencer Tracy, Basil Rathbone, Jeffrey Hunter and Pat OBrien

programme.title: A Lawless Street
programme.desc: A long-serving marshal, who has done his utmost to the keep peace in the town of Medicine Bend, looks forward to a reconciliation with his estranged wife, a touring musical star. Just as she arrives in town, three notorious criminals show up and start causing trouble - and the lawman has to decide whether to hang up his guns for his wifes sake or do his duty. Western, with Randolph Scott, Angela Lansbury, Jean Parker and Warner Anderson

programme.title: The Admirable Crichton
programme.desc: Lord Loam is proud of his tendency to treat his staff as equals - to a point - while his manservant Crichton believes people should know their place. However, when the entire household is shipwrecked on a desert island, it is the resourceful butler who rises to the top of the pecking order - to the horror of his supposedly liberal master. Comedy based on JM Barries play, starring Kenneth More, Cecil Parker, Diane Cilento and Peter Graves

programme.title: Gift Horse
programme.desc: A Navy captain reluctantly takes command of an old US destroyer during the Second World War and struggles with a crew who do not respect his authority. However, the prospect of facing the mighty German force brings much-needed unity. Adventure, starring Trevor Howard, Richard Attenborough, Bernard Lee, Sonny Tufts and James Donald

programme.title: Enemy Mine
programme.desc: In the midst of a war between humans and aliens, two space pilots from opposite sides are marooned together on an inhospitable planet and are forced to set aside their mutual animosity to survive. Sci-fi adventure, starring Dennis Quaid, Louis Gossett Jr and Brion James

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds
programme.desc: American officer Aldo Raine leads a squad of soldiers into occupied France on a mission to kill as many Nazis as possible and spread fear through the Third Reich. They become involved in a Jewish resistance fighters plan to blow up the premiere of a propaganda movie - due to be attended by Hitler himself. Quentin Tarantinos wartime adventure, with Brad Pitt, Melanie Laurent, Diane Kruger, Michael Fassbender and an Oscar-winning Christoph Waltz

programme.title: Freaky
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old Millie Kessler spends her days trying to survive high school and the cruel actions of the popular crowd. But when she becomes the latest target of the Butcher, the towns infamous serial killer, her senior year becomes the least of her worries. When the Butchers mystical dagger causes him and Millie to magically switch bodies, the frightened teen learns she has just 24 hours to get her identity back before she looks like a middle-aged maniac for ever. Comedy horror, starring Vince Vaughn and Kathryn Newton

programme.title: Deerskin
programme.desc: A man seeking a fresh start after his divorce relocates to an Alpine village, where he poses as an independent film-maker and becomes obsessed with a vintage deerskin jacket. He imagines the jacket is talking to him, and persuades a local bartender to help him document his new mission - helping it to become the only jacket in the world. Comedy horror, starring Jean Dujardin and Adele Haenel. In French with English subtitles

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Hayley plucks up the courage to tell Christian his father is still alive when he asks to see Harolds grave, and Audrey comes under fire for supporting David.

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: The news of Martins Imperial College job offer goes flying through the village, but the Ellinghams are yet to make a decision. Caitlin blames Bert for the flooded pub cellar, and an emergency on the rocks helps Morwenna make some important decisions

programme.title: The Royal
programme.sub-title: Should I Stay or Should I Go Now
programme.desc: Timid new student nurse Faye Clark is faced with a trying first day when a model collapses after taking magic mushrooms. programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: An old friend of Merton is sent from CID to help track down a bank robber, and he agrees to be best man at the wedding, while Jennys disgraced brother Steve tries to patch things up with his sister before she ties the knot. programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Ventress goes in search of a bogus water board official who has been robbing the elderly, but ends up investigating a suspicious death linked to one of the burglaries. Meanwhile, Blaketon seeks to rectify a miscarriage of justice by reviving a pre-war darts tournament between the Aidensfield Arms and the White Lion, and Gina begins to get cold feet about her impending marriage to Phil. Rural drama, starring Derek Fowlds and William Simons

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Gray is out for revenge, but Perdys mind is elsewhere as she agrees to visit Matthew. Meanwhile, Belle ensures the show will go on.

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Hayley finally reveals the truth to Christian, who recoils in horror and knocks her to the ground in disgust, and Sallys hopes of a sophisticated evening with John are dashed.

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Hayley hides away in the flat and blames Roy for the fiasco with Christian. Jamie and Violet return from Carols wedding in jubilant mood, while Cilla arrives back from the States.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Neville Chamberlain visits Downton for dinner, and is drawn into Violets plan to save the hospital, with distressing consequences for everyone. Andy finds an unexpected confidante while helping Mr Mason move into Yew Tree Farm, Mary is uncertain if she has met her match, Edith meets Bertie Pelham in London, and Spratt comes to Denkers aid. Mrs Hughes struggles to keep Carson happy, while Mary thinks secrets are being kept from her

programme.title: Agatha Christies Poirot
programme.sub-title: The Affair at the Victory Ball
programme.desc: The sleuth is invited to attend a masquerade ball dressed as someone famous and modestly goes as himself - and finds time amid the revelry to solve the murder of aristocratic fellow guest Lord Cronshaw. David Suchet stars

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Jenny and Dennis are forced to cut short their honeymoon in Spain, and Gina grows increasingly unhappy at the thought of having to give up her job as pub licensee to marry a policeman. Ventress creates a bad impression at the station, and a crooked travel agent finds a way of cashing in on local holiday-makers absence, while Vernon organises a Bentley owners rally at the hall. Sarah Tansey and Duncan Bell star

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Dr Merrick is called out to a remote farmhouse, where she discovers three children have been left orphaned by the death of their father. Adamant that the family should stay together, Steve helps the eldest fight a custody battle, but a series of obstacles stands in their way. Meanwhile, Vernon opens a caravan park, but it is David who ends up having to entertain the not-so-happy campers

programme.title: Rosemary and Thyme
programme.sub-title: The Memory of Water - Part Two
programme.desc: Part two of two. The amateur sleuths continue their investigation after Martin Frazers cousin, who supposedly drowned, is spotted alive and well a few days later. Mystery drama, starring Felicity Kendal and Pam Ferris

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: The detective investigates a daring robbery at a port and uncovers a web of intrigue when it turns out to be an inside job. However the insiders motivation isnt just money as his son has been kidnapped to make sure everyone sticks to the plan, which ends up going horribly wrong

programme.title: Lewis
programme.desc: A student production of The Merchant of Venice is halted when the actor playing Shylock is murdered during the performance. Lewis and Hathaway are struck by the lack of grief among the cast and crew - especially the ambitious director, who wastes no time recasting the role. The detectives discover the victim had an expensive lifestyle and not only owed money to his fellow students, but was also suspected of stealing from them. However, the investigation has barely got under way before the killer strikes again. Kevin Whately and Laurence Fox star

programme.desc: The house is made open to the public for a day to raise money for the hospital, an act that divides opinions among the family and the servants. Carson is not happy with Thomas, but all is not as it appears, while Mary and Edith hope to overcome their past and find new happiness with the men in their lives

programme.title: Agatha Christies Poirot
programme.desc: The Belgian detectives curiosity is aroused by the passengers on board a luxury cruise ship bound for Egypt - particularly a woman who appears inordinately offensive to her fellow travellers. When the vessel arrives at Alexandria, the irritating ladys body is discovered in her cabin - leaving the sleuth with a host of possible suspects to interrogate. David Suchet stars

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Steve does his bit for the community by taking a group of delinquents on an outdoor adventure course on the moors, but one of the lads falls and breaks his ankle, while another is wanted for stealing from a shop. Vernon sees a money-making opportunity when a religious sect arrives in Aidensfield looking for somewhere to hold a meditation convention. Rural police drama, starring James Carlton and Geoffrey Hughes

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: An elderly man reports an unusual break-in, during which the uninvited visitor left a mysterious statue on the kitchen table. It soon emerges that it is just the first in a series of unexplained events, as a police phone box arrives and then disappears from his garden, cement is delivered to his house for no apparent reason and a fire is started in his garage. Noakes advises Steve to keep well away as it is not technically a police matter, but the officer decides to investigate further. Rural drama, starring Trevor Ray, Georgie Glen and James Carlton

programme.title: Rosemary and Thyme
programme.desc: The duo are enlisted to design a memorial garden based on the myth of Orpheus and Eurydice, but someone begins vandalising their work on a nightly basis. Matters are complicated still further by the death of a recovering alcoholic, whose body is found at the site. Mystery drama, starring Felicity Kendal and Pam Ferris, with Phyllida Law, Joanna David and Daisy Dunlop

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: Primary school teacher Lizzy Swann is found dead at the bottom of a cliffside coastal walkway, but what appears at first to be a terrible accident, quickly becomes a murder investigation as Vera discovers evidence the body has been tampered with. Interviews with those who knew Lizzy paint a troubling picture of a guarded and paranoid woman who seemed to be burning bridges with friends and family alike in the days leading up to her death

programme.title: Lewis
programme.desc: Religious fanatic Steven Mullan is found beaten and drowned in his bath. Lewis and Hathaway discover he had been imprisoned for trying to kill well-known atheist Tom Rattan and had only recently been released. The inspector soon has reason to believe the Rattan family is hiding something from him - but nothing prepares him for the evidence Dr Hobson uncovers at the post-mortem. Kevin Whately and Laurence Fox star, with guest appearances by Jenny Seagrove and Julian Wadham

Belinda and Lee start an adventurous project turning an outbuilding into a two-bedroom gîte. Narrated by Adjoa Andoh

programme.title: Chateau DIY
programme.desc: With a first booking on the cards, Ben and Billie must finish renovating their ballroom, but a delay in the delivery of five two-metre-tall mirrors may scupper their chances

Presented by Tayo Oguntonade, Simon OBrien and Carys Davies
